Package be.helha.applicine.server.dao.impl

Class ViewableDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
be.helha.applicine.server.dao.impl.ViewableDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewableDAO
public class ViewableDAOImpl extends Object implements ViewableDAO
ViewableDAOImpl is the implementation of the ViewableDAO interface.
